rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with Scandinavian minimalism, incorporating clean lines and natural light.
Open-concept living room that integrates with the dining area, featuring large windows for natural lighting, following Vastu principles with east-facing orientation.
Seamless integration with the living room, designed to maintain a fluid indoor space while adhering to Scandinavian design aesthetics.
Modern kitchen layout optimized for functionality, incorporating sustainable materials and ample storage, with north-eastern orientation per Vastu guidelines.
Functional bathroom designed with Scandinavian simplicity in mind, ensuring efficient water drainage following local building norms.
Garage space for two vehicles, designed for ease of access and minimalistic design elements.

openings.description: Large double door opening designed to allow natural light and create an inviting atmosphere.
Multiple strategically placed windows in the living area, enhancing ventilation and providing a Scandinavian aesthetic with a focus on natural light.
Service windows connecting the kitchen to the servant's quarters for efficient service management.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, designed to ensure privacy and comfort.
Additional bedroom for children or guests, incorporating natural light and Scandinavian design elements.
Functional bathroom designed with efficient water drainage in mind, following local building norms.
Dedicated servant's quarters located at the rear of the first floor for privacy and convenience.

openings.description: Balcony attached to the master bedroom providing outdoor space and natural light.
Service door connecting the servant's quarters with the ground floor for ease of access.
